cause.description:
The 9/11 Truth Movement is a dedicated and important grassroots effort of 9/11 survivors and family members, firefighters, architects, engineers, scientists, professors, entertainers/filmmakers, media professionals, former military, former intelligence service, law enforcement, government officials and regular everyday citizens of America and the world who demand that unanswered questions be answered, and that the guilty parties be flushed out and held accountable.
If you are a truth seeker, or if you have the slightest bit of doubt regarding the official 9/11 story, you are not alone. A public opinion poll about 9/11 conducted by Zogby International in May 2006 indicated that:
42% of Americans more likely agree with people who "believe that the US government and its 9/11 Commission concealed or refused to investigate critical evidence that contradicts their official explanation of the September 11th attacks, saying there has been a cover-up."
Start asking questions, start listening to the alternative theories. If you are intrigued but skeptical, we urge you to keep an open mind and researching the movement's assertions.
All donations go to supporting Architects & Engineers for 9/11 Truth, a non-partisan association of now more than 1,300 Architects, Engineers and affiliates demanding renewed investigation into the “collapses” of the three WTC high-rises on 9/11/01.
If you are new to these ideas, we suggest these links as a starting point for your own quest for 9/11 truth:
The Journal of 9/11 Studies Beginners' Guide to 9/11 Truth http://www.journalof911studies.com/beginners.html
The Top 40 Reasons to Doubt the Official Story of September 11th, 2001" by 911Truth.org http://www.911truth.org/article.php?story=20041221155307646
Filmmaker Dylan Avery's documentary Loose Change: Final Cut (You can watch the full version online at Google video) http://video.google.com/videoplay?docid=-3719259008768610598
